name: Lost in the forest (itch) (LGN_ROYAL, tinu.io)
description:
A game submitted for the Brakeys Game Jam 2021.1 with the theme "stronger toghether".

It still a very short game due to his origin of being made for a Game Jam.

SPOILER WARNING

This game is about a kid that get lost in a forest. With the help of the player and his cursor they will then try to traverse it together.
